org.activebpel.rt.bpel.server.engine.storage
Interface IAeCoordinationStorage

All Superinterfaces:
IAeStorage
All Known Implementing Classes:
AeCoordinationStorage
public interface IAeCoordinationStorage
extends IAeStorage

Interface for coordination persistence storage layer.

Method Summary
 AeCoordinationContext createContext(AeCreateContextRequest aCtxRequest, IAeCoordinationId aCoordinationId, java.lang.String aState, int aRole)
          Creates a coordination context.
 IAeCoordinating getCoordination(java.lang.String aCoordinationId, long aProcessId)
          Returns list of coordinations matching the process id and coordination id.
 java.util.List getCoordinations(java.lang.String aCoordinationId)
          Returns list of coordinations with matching coordination id.
 java.util.List getCoordinationsByProcessId(long aProcessId)
          Returns all coordinations matching the given process id.
 java.util.List getCoordinatorDetail(long aChildProcessId)
          Returns the coordinator (parent) detail given a participant (child) process id.
 java.util.List getParticipantDetail(long aParentProcessId)
          Returns a list of participants (children) given the coordinator (parent) process id.
 void setCoordinationManager(IAeCoordinationManager aManager)
          Sets the coordination manager.
 void updateCoordinationContext(AePersistentCoordinationId aCoordinationId, AeCoordinationContext aContext)
          Updates the context of the coordination.
 void updateCoordinationState(AePersistentCoordinationId aCoordinationId, java.lang.String aState)
          Updates the state of the given coordination id.

createContext

public AeCoordinationContext createContext(AeCreateContextRequest aCtxRequest,
                                           IAeCoordinationId aCoordinationId,
                                           java.lang.String aState,
                                           int aRole)
                                    throws AeStorageException
Creates a coordination context. If the coordination id is null, a new coordination id will be generated by the storage layer.
